ml_parser_test_cases.name: Timestamp and Level Oddities
ml_parser_test_cases.description: Logs with missing timestamps, duplicate timestamps, out-of-order timestamps, unknown log levels, and lowercase/strange log levels.
lines: INFO Started system with no timestamp

ml_parser_test_cases.name: Multi-line and Stack Trace Variants
ml_parser_test_cases.description: Logs with stack traces (unusual indentation, missing headers), and multi-line logs with embedded JSON.

ml_parser_test_cases.description: Logs with ANSI color codes, shell escape sequences, and control characters.

real_world_scenarios.name: Web Application Logs
real_world_scenarios.description: Typical web application logs with user actions, errors, and performance metrics
lines: 2024-06-01 12:00:00 INFO [UserService] User login successful: user_id=12345, ip=192.168.1.100
2024-06-01 12:00:01 INFO [OrderService] Order created: order_id=67890, user_id=12345, amount=299.99
2024-06-01 12:00:02 WARN [PaymentService] Payment processing slow: order_id=67890, duration=5.2s
2024-06-01 12:00:04 INFO [EmailService] Order confirmation sent: order_id=67890, email=user@example.com

real_world_scenarios.description: Logs from microservices communicating with each other
lines: 2024-06-01 12:00:00 INFO [API-Gateway] Request received: method=POST, path=/api/orders, client_ip=10.0.0.1
2024-06-01 12:00:03 INFO [Inventory-Service] Stock check completed: product_id=ABC123, available=true
2024-06-01 12:00:04 ERROR [Payment-Service] Payment gateway timeout: order_id=67890, provider=stripe
